identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create an Investment Real Estate App that blends 'Swiss Precision' with 'Organic Warmth'. Avoid generic SaaS tropes.

usage.h1: font-serif text-5xl md:text-7xl font-medium tracking-tight leading-[1.1]
usage.h3: font-sans text-xl md:text-2xl font-bold tracking-tight uppercase text-muted-foreground
usage.label: font-sans text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-widest text-muted-foreground

primary.name: Deep Forest
primary.usage: Primary Buttons, Active States, Dark Mode Backgrounds

accent.name: Acid Lime
accent.usage: CTAs, Data Highlights, Success States (The E1 Twist)

grids.marketing: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-8 (The Tetris Grid)
grids.dashboard: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-6 (The Control Room)

buttons.primary: bg-[#1A3C34] text-white hover:bg-[#142E28] rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95 shadow-xl shadow-[#1A3C34]/20
buttons.secondary: bg-[#F5F2EB] text-[#1A3C34] border border-[#1A3C34]/10 hover:border-[#1A3C34] rounded-full px-6 py-4 font-medium transition-all
buttons.accent: bg-[#D4F238] text-[#1A3C34] hover:bg-[#E2FF45] rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-bold uppercase tracking-wide shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(212,242,56,0.4)]

cards.base: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-[#1A3C34]/5 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300
cards.premium: relative overflow-hidden border border-[#D4F238]/50 bg-[#0F1211] text-white (Use Tracing Beam effect)

inputs.style: bg-white border-0 ring-1 ring-[#1A3C34]/10 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#1A3C34] rounded-xl px-4 py-3 text-lg shadow-inner placeholder:text-slate-400

textures.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

effects.tracing_beam: Animate a gradient border around premium cards using Framer Motion

hero.usage: Hero Section Background or Main Visual

anti_slop_rules: DO NOT use generic 'Inter' font for headings. Use Playfair Display.
DO NOT use full-screen gradients. Use noise textures and solid colors.
DO NOT center everything. Use asymmetry and the 'Tetris Grid'.
DO NOT use default Shadcn styling. Customize radii to 'rounded-xl' or 'rounded-full'.
accessibility: Ensure text contrast ratio is at least 4.5:1.
Focus states must be visible and high-contrast.
motion: Hover states must lift elements (-translate-y-1) and increase shadow.

instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-end Real Estate Investment Tool. Think 'Architectural Digest' meets 'Bloomberg Terminal'. Use the provided colors and fonts strictly. Implement the 'Tetris Grid' for the landing page and 'Control Room' layout for the dashboard. Use the 'Acid Lime' accent sparingly to guide the user's eye to key conversion points (ROI, 'Get Started').
